pr_title: chore(griffin) - various view and functions needed for Kafka metadata queries

timeline.message: chore(griffin) - various functions for Kafka PG-driver metadata queries
fix(sql): fixed sql bug to do with top down column propagation

timeline.bodyText:
the goal of the SQL is to enumerate table columns like PG does
 nspname | relname  |  attname   | atttypid | attnotnull | atttypmod | attlen | typtypmod | attnum | attidentity | adsrc | description | typbasetype | typtype
---------+----------+------------+----------+------------+-----------+--------+-----------+--------+-------------+-------+-------------+-------------+---------
 public  | po_items | po_no      |       23 | t          |        -1 |      4 |        -1 |      1 |             |       |             |           0 | b
 public  | po_items | item_no    |       23 | t          |        -1 |      4 |        -1 |      2 |             |       |             |           0 | b
 public  | po_items | product_no |       23 | f          |        -1 |      4 |        -1 |      3 |             |       |             |           0 | b
 public  | po_items | qty        |       23 | f          |        -1 |      4 |        -1 |      4 |             |       |             |           0 | b
 public  | po_items | net_price  |     1700 | f          |        -1 |     -1 |        -1 |      5 |             |       |             |           0 | b
(5 rows)
timeline.author: bluestreak01

timeline.bodyText: the aim of the SQL is to enum columns. Having constant 0 out of the field isn't going to work
timeline.author: bluestreak01

timeline.message: chore(griffin) - pg_type and pg_attribute now return type information
chore(griffin) - refactored pg_description and pg_attrdef to return column metadata
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata queries: renamed inner class
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata queries: removed extra copyright in FunctionFactory
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata functions: fixed flapping test in AttrDefCatalogueFunctionFactoryTest
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata functions: type name and  type size fixes
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata functions: added function removed by mistake
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata functions: added tests for failed int read
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata functions: fixed broken tests
chore(griffin) - kafka metadata functions: fixed broken tests

timeline.bodyText: lets investigate what PG expects for attidentity. Character.MIN_VALUE is not the same as null

replies.bodyText: or add a comment on what this means

timeline.bodyText: PG_TYPE_TO_INTERNAL_TYPE_MAP is not used for anything other than working out size of type. Change the data structure to provide size right away without call to sizeof() and if
